Administration

Class ConnectDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Administration.ConnectDataBase

  • public class ConnectDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Max on 03.03.2017. This Class responsible for database issues. It establishes a connection to the database and creates SQL-Statements out of passed Information. All kinds of inserts, updates and deletes are handled here as well as the connect and drop function of the database connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectDataBase()
      Creates a new Object ConnectDataBase which establishes a connection to the database and handles all database actions for the future

      • getInstance

        public static ConnectDataBase getInstance()

      • insertChallenge

        public void insertChallenge(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            int completionTime,
                            int idCreator,
                            int idChallenge)
        Inserts a challenge into the database
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the challenge
        description - Description of the challenge
        completionTime - Time for completion of the challenge
        idCreator - ID of the creator
        idChallenge - ID of the challenge

      • insertUser

        public void insertUser(int userID,
                       java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       int birthday,
                       int birthmonth,
                       int birthyear,
                       java.lang.String profilePic,
                       int challengesCompleted,
                       int challengeAssigned,
                       int reputation)
        Inserts a user into the database
        Parameters:
        userID - UserID of the user
        username - username of the user
        password - password of the user
        birthday - Birthday of the user
        birthmonth - Birthmonth of the user
        birthyear - Birthyear of the user
        profilePic - String or address of the profilePic
        challengesCompleted - number of challenges completed
        challengeAssigned - Current challenge assinged (default 0)
        reputation - Current deputation of the user (default 0)

      • searchLastIndex

        public int searchLastIndex(java.lang.String table)
        Scan the referenced table and search for the highest ID
        Parameters:
        table - name of the table
        Returns:
        Last entry of the referenced table

      • updateDataBaseString

        public void updateDataBaseString(java.lang.String value,
                                 java.lang.String column,
                                 int id,
                                 java.lang.String whereColumn,
                                 java.lang.String table)
        Creates a SQL-Query to update the database on the basis of the Parameters for int values
        Parameters:
        value - Value to be inserted into the database
        column - Name of column which gets selected
        id - ID from the challenge or user for which we want to search
        whereColumn - Name of the column for the WHERE-Condition
        table - Name of the database to update in
